headline: Product Engineering Services Market worth $1,800.45 billion by 2030
summary: According to MarketsandMarkets™, the global Product Engineering Services Market size is projected to reach 1,800.45 billion by 2030 from USD 1,297.71 billion in 2025, at a CAGR of 6.8% during the forecast period.

headline: Healthcare & Life Sciences NLP Market Report 2025-2030, with Case Studies of CSL Behring, IQVIA, Atrius Health,  Linguamatics, Humana, Watson, Philips, and Amazon
summary: The NLP in healthcare & life sciences market is projected to grow from USD 5.18 billion in 2025 to USD 16.01 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 25.3%. This growth is driven by the need to convert unstructured clinical data into actionable insights, enhancing clinical decision support. Key segments include Natural Language Generation (NLG), which improves documentation efficiency, and Named Entity Recognition (NER), critical for extracting structured information. headline: NetBox Labs Raises $35M Series B to Meet Demand to Modernize Network and Infrastructure Operations
summary: NetBox platform adoption explodes as companies race to better deploy, manage, and secure business-critical networks and infrastructureNEW YORK, July 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- NetBox Labs, today announced it has raised $35 million in a Series B funding round led by NGP Capital, with participation from Sorenson Capital and Headline. headline: Billionaire Warren Buffett Owns These 3 Quantum Computing Stocks. Should You?
summary: Buffett doesn't have any quantum computing stocks in Berkshire Hathaway's portfolio.  All three companies are investing heavily in quantum computing, but there are better reasons to buy the stocks.  Theoretical physicist Richard Feynman once said, "I think I can safely say that nobody understands quantum mechanics."
